nodes.excerpt: Do you find yourself digging through email threads trying to find the version of a contract in which a specific change was introduced? Who proposed the change? Was it your lawyer, or your customer? If this pain is familiar, Version Story is here to help.

nodes.excerpt: Charge Running is a mobile app that provides live running classes with others from all over the world! Trainers will update you on your stats and interact with you and your fellow runners in our real-time chat room.
nodes.title: Charge Running - Social running app with real-time coaching

nodes.excerpt: Looking to get genuine users on-board with minimum drop offs? Our offer includes identity verifications (KYC) for automating individual on-boarding and enhancing customer experience. We envision creating a trusted ecosystem where identity is the key to access.

nodes.excerpt: One-of-a-kind portrait, landscape and abstract artworks created by Artificial Intelligence. Each artwork is minted as a non-fungible token (NFT) on Ethereum's own blockchain.

nodes.excerpt: CoinGecko provides a fundamental analysis of the crypto market. In addition to tracking price, volume and market capitalization, CoinGecko tracks community growth, open-source code development, major events and on-chain metrics.
nodes.title: CoinGecko - 360-degree overview of the crypto market

nodes.excerpt: TheProdcast is a technology podcast featuring seasoned product professionals, CEOs, Founders, and VCs. While our Season 1 focused on the stars behind stellar products that people love, Season 2 is all about impactful stories of promising women techologists.

nodes.excerpt: FlashDrive NoOps app platform handles everything for you while you focus on your product. Made by developers for developers, FlashDrive is compatible with Git deployment (Github, Gitlabs etc...), DockerHub etc... Free backups, SSL certs. and load balancers.
nodes.title: FlashDrive.io - noOps app platform for your apps

nodes.excerpt: Each week, we find you the single best article to read next for getting better at your job. In our mobile app, you're grouped with people in your role at different companies who are reading the same thing. Features facilitate intimate peer-to-peer learning.
nodes.title: Homeroom - Personalized short-form learning for moving up in tech

nodes.excerpt: Candid helps companies resume screen applicants to find the best and filter out the rest. Is your resume good enough to pass a resume screening? See if you pass the test by trying our demo on our website by uploading your resume to get automated insights.
